alert.note: Alert for Holmes; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 5:59PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Holmes and central Washington Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 459 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Geneva to 9 miles west of Vernon. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Vernon, Bonifay, Caryville, Esto, Westville, Noma, Hinsons Crossroads, Whitehead Crossroads, Tendil Crossing, Gritney, Holmes Valley, Holland Crossroads, Cobb Crossroads, Smith Crossroads, Izagora, Smyrna, Noma Junction, Sylvania, Johnson Crossroads and Miller Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
